text: "Buy Me a Pony" is a song by Australian alternative rock band, Spiderbait and was released in September 1996 as the lead single from the band's third studio album Ivy and the Big Apples. "Buy Me a Pony" peaked at number 45 on the Australian chart. The song ranked at number 1 on Triple J's Hottest 100 in 1996. At the ARIA Music Awards of 1997, the song was nominated for Single of the Year, losing out to "Truly Madly Deeply" by Savage Garden. ==Track listings== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1996/97) !scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row" |} ==Release history== {|class=wikitable !
